parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The tag key-value pairs to add to the on-premises instances. Keys and values are both required. Keys cannot be null or empty strings. Value-only tags are not allowed. (dict) --- Information about a tag. Key (string) --- The tag's key. Value (string) --- The tag's value.

parameters.name: instanceNames
parameters.description: The names of the on-premises instances to which to add tags. (string) ---
